posts.author: InitiativeTracker
posts.content:
I think the 2024 changes to advice make it much more balanced compared to before.

In the new 2024 rules update, they changed how advice works. Now it's more streamlined but I'm not sure if it's better overall.

Has anyone tried optimizing a build around advice? I'm curious about the best way to leverage this for my character.

In my campaign, we had a situation with advice that played out really well. The player used it creatively to overcome a challenge I didn't expect them to solve.
